subtopics.subtopic: PM distributes 51,000+ govt job letters on July 12
subtopics.content: • On July 12, 2025, Prime Minister Narendra Modi led the 16th Rozgar Mela, distributing over 51,000 appointment letters across 47 locations for positions in Railways, Health, Posts, Finance, and more. • Initiative aims to reduce youth unemployment through public sector placements.

topic: 2. India–US Trade Tensions & Russian Oil – July 31

subtopics.subtopic: India to continue Russian oil imports despite Trump tariff threat on July 31
subtopics.content: • On July 31, 2025, India reaffirmed its decision to persist in Russian oil imports despite Trump's announcement of up to 25% tariffs, citing long‑term contracts and energy security strategy. • Oil accounts for ~35% of Indian imports.

subtopics.subtopic: AP collects ₹3,803 crore GST in July 2025
subtopics.content: • Andhra Pradesh posted ₹3,803 crore in gross GST and ₹2,930 crore net GST collections in July 2025. • Growth of 12–14% YoY credited to better compliance, analytics audits, and enforcement measures.

topic: 4. Khelo Bharat Niti 2025 Policy Launch – July 2025

subtopics.subtopic: PM announces inclusive sports policy in July Mann Ki Baat
subtopics.content: • In July 2025, PM Modi unveiled Khelo Bharat Niti 2025, prioritizing grassroots sports, sport‑spike startups, inclusion of girls, rural areas, and economically weaker sections.

subtopics.subtopic: Cross‑border strikes on insurgent camps on July 13
subtopics.content: • On July 13, 2025, India reportedly struck ULFA‑I and NSCN‑YA camps in Myanmar using drones. • ULFA claimed 3 deaths; Indian Army declared no official involvement.

subtopics.subtopic: Joint Earth‑observation satellite lifts off on July 30
subtopics.content: • On July 30, 2025, India launched NASA‑ISRO NISAR satellite aboard GSLV‑F16 from Sriharikota. • Mission for global land, ice, and disaster monitoring via dual-frequency radar.

subtopics.subtopic: Debate over Pahalgam attack & Operation Sindoor on July 28
subtopics.content: • Parliament resumed Monsoon Session on July 28, 2025 with heated discussions expected over the April Pahalgam terrorist attack and India's response, Operation Sindoor.

topic: 8. Mumbai Train Bombings Verdict Stay – July 21

subtopics.subtopic: Bombay HC acquits accused; SC stays acquittal on July 21
subtopics.content: • On July 21, 2025, Bombay High Court acquitted 12 accused in the 2006 Mumbai train bombings; on July 24, the Supreme Court stayed the acquittal order.

topic: 9. Tourist Visa Resumption for China – July 23

subtopics.subtopic: Tourist visas to Chinese resumed on July 23
subtopics.content: • On July 23, 2025, India resumed issuing tourist visas to Chinese nationals after a five-year suspension imposed during border tensions.

subtopics.subtopic: Rajasthan school roof collapse kills children on July 25
subtopics.content: • On July 25, 2025, a school roof collapsed in Piplodi village (Jhalawar, Rajasthan), killing seven children and injuring several others, renewing safety concerns.

topic: 11. IMF Revises India Growth Forecast – July 2025

subtopics.subtopic: IMF projects 6.4% GDP growth for FY26 and FY27 in July update
subtopics.content: • In its July 2025 World Economic Outlook, IMF lifted India’s growth forecast to 6.4% for both FY2025–26 and FY2026–27, keeping India among the fastest‑growing major economies.

subtopics.subtopic: Security forces recover 203 firearms on July 4
subtopics.content: • On July 4, 2025, security forces recovered 203 firearms during joint operations in Manipur amid ethnic violence, enhancing regional security preparedness.

topic: 13. Tamil Nadu Fireworks Factory Blast – July 8

subtopics.subtopic: Blast kills ten at Virudhunagar factory on July 8
subtopics.content: • On July 8, 2025, a fire and explosion at a fireworks factory in Virudhunagar, Tamil Nadu killed 10 people and injured many more.

subtopics.subtopic: Vadodara bridge collapse kills 11 on July 9
subtopics.content: • On July 9, 2025, the Gambhira-Mujpur bridge in Vadodara collapsed, killing 11 people and causing multiple vehicles to plunge into water.

topic: 15. IAF Trainer Crash in Rajasthan – July 9

subtopics.subtopic: Train aircraft crash kills two pilots on July 9
subtopics.content: • On July 9, 2025, an IAF trainer plane crashed near Churu, Rajasthan, killing both pilots onboard.

topic: 16. Woman & Children Found in Forest Cave – July 9

subtopics.subtopic: Russian woman and daughters found living in cave in Karnataka on July 9
subtopics.content: • On July 9, 2025, a Russian woman and her two daughters were discovered living in a forest cave near Ramatirtha Hill in Karnataka after surviving alone for a week.

subtopics.subtopic: Maratha Military Landscapes inscribed World Heritage on July 11
subtopics.content: • On July 11, 2025, UNESCO designated the Maratha Military Landscapes of India as World Heritage Sites.

subtopics.subtopic: Violent protests over Waqf (Amendment) Act across India in July
subtopics.content: • In July 2025, protests erupted across West Bengal, Tripura and Maharashtra over the Waqf Amendment Act, with arrests and casualties reported. Critics called the law discriminatory.

topic: 19. Civil Defence Mock Drill ‘Operation Abhyaas’ – July 2025

subtopics.subtopic: Exercise held nationwide post‑Pahalgam attack in early July
subtopics.content: • On July 7, 2025, India conducted 'Operation Abhyaas' across 244 districts as a civil defence drill involving mock blackouts, sirens, and evacuation exercises.

topic: 20. UPI Payments Achieve Record Volume – July 2025

subtopics.subtopic: UPI transacts ₹25.1 lakh crore in July
subtopics.content: • In July 2025, UPI recorded 1,947 crore transactions totalling ₹25.1 lakh crore—a 35% rise in volume and 22% in value YoY, highlighting digital penetration.

subtopics.subtopic: NSDL IPO worth $458M fully sold within hours on July 30
subtopics.content: • On July 30, 2025, NSDL’s $458 million IPO was oversubscribed within hours due to robust investor demand; valued at ~₹760–₹800 per share.

subtopics.subtopic: Public spat over nationalism expressed on July 31
subtopics.content: • On July 31, 2025, industrialist Harsh Goenka publicly rebuked Hotmail co‑founder Sabeer Bhatia over criticisms of nationalism, reigniting debate on diaspora and patriotism.

subtopics.subtopic: Academic report reviews LIGO‑India project scope
subtopics.content: • In July 2025, an academic assessment revisited LIGO‑India’s progress, projecting that commissioning may extend beyond 2032 with increased budget estimates (~₹35 billion).

topic: 24. PM Modi’s Five‑Nation Tour Begins – July 2

subtopics.subtopic: Visits Ghana, Trinidad, Argentina, Brazil & Namibia starting July 2
subtopics.content: • PM Modi embarked on a tour across five nations from July 2 to 9, 2025, including participation in the BRICS Summit in Brazil to deepen diplomatic and trade ties.

subtopics.subtopic: India resists US-imposed trade deal timelines on July 4
subtopics.content: • On July 4, 2025, Trade Minister Piyush Goyal stated India would enter agreements only in its national interest and not rush to meet external deadlines amid bilateral pressure.

subtopics.subtopic: Heavy monsoon rains cause flooding in Kerala in July
subtopics.content:
• In July 2025, Kerala experienced severe flooding due to heavy monsoon rains, leading to displacement of thousands and damage to crops and infrastructure.
• State government launched relief operations and requested central assistance.

subtopics.subtopic: Major narcotics bust in Punjab in July
subtopics.content:
• In July 2025, Punjab police seized over 200 kg of heroin and arrested several suspects in a crackdown on drug trafficking networks.
• State authorities intensified border surveillance and anti-narcotics operations.

subtopics.subtopic: Odisha government conducts cyclone drills in July
subtopics.content:
• In July 2025, Odisha government conducted large-scale cyclone preparedness drills in coastal districts.
• Focused on evacuation, shelter management, and coordination with disaster response teams.

subtopics.subtopic: Kaziranga reports rise in rhino population in July
subtopics.content:
• In July 2025, Kaziranga National Park, Assam, reported an increase in the one-horned rhinoceros population due to anti-poaching efforts and habitat restoration.
• State wildlife officials highlighted ongoing conservation initiatives.

topic: 30. Andhra Pradesh Polavaram Project Progress – July 2025

subtopics.subtopic: Polavaram dam construction advances in July
subtopics.content: • In July 2025, Andhra Pradesh government reported significant progress in Polavaram irrigation project, with new spillway gates installed.

topic: 31. Arunachal Pradesh Border Road Completion – July 2025

subtopics.subtopic: Strategic road to China border completed in July
subtopics.content: • In July 2025, Arunachal Pradesh completed a key border road to improve connectivity and security near the China border.

subtopics.subtopic: Tea exports from Assam rise in July
subtopics.content: • Assam reported a 15% increase in tea exports in July 2025, driven by demand from Europe and Middle East.

subtopics.subtopic: Bihar launches flood relief camps in July
subtopics.content: • In July 2025, Bihar government set up over 200 flood relief camps for displaced families in northern districts.

subtopics.subtopic: New tribal scholarship scheme launched in July
subtopics.content: • Chhattisgarh launched a scholarship scheme for tribal students in July 2025, aiming to boost higher education enrollment.

subtopics.subtopic: Goa promotes monsoon tourism in July
subtopics.content: • Goa Tourism Department launched a monsoon festival in July 2025 to attract domestic tourists.

subtopics.subtopic: Gujarat expands solar park capacity in July
subtopics.content: • Gujarat added 500 MW to its solar park capacity in July 2025, reinforcing its renewable energy leadership.

subtopics.subtopic: Haryana launches sports talent hunt in July
subtopics.content: • Haryana initiated a state-wide sports talent identification program in July 2025 for youth athletes.

topic: 38. Himachal Pradesh Apple Harvest Begins – July 2025

subtopics.subtopic: Apple harvest season starts in Himachal in July
subtopics.content: • Himachal Pradesh began its apple harvest in July 2025, expecting a bumper crop due to favorable weather.

subtopics.subtopic: Jharkhand revises mining policy in July
subtopics.content: • Jharkhand government updated its mining policy in July 2025 to improve transparency and revenue.

subtopics.subtopic: Karnataka launches electric buses in July
subtopics.content: • Karnataka introduced 100 new electric buses in Bengaluru in July 2025 to reduce urban pollution.

subtopics.subtopic: Kerala expands health mission in July
subtopics.content: • Kerala government expanded its Arogya Kerala health mission in July 2025, adding new clinics in rural areas.

topic: 42. Madhya Pradesh Tiger Census Results – July 2025

subtopics.subtopic: Madhya Pradesh releases tiger census data in July
subtopics.content: • Madhya Pradesh reported a 10% increase in tiger population in July 2025, strengthening its status as India's tiger state.

subtopics.subtopic: Maharashtra launches water conservation campaign in July
subtopics.content: • Maharashtra started a water conservation drive in July 2025, focusing on drought-prone districts.

subtopics.subtopic: Manipur peace talks advance in July
subtopics.content: • Manipur government reported progress in peace talks with insurgent groups in July 2025.

subtopics.subtopic: Meghalaya records highest July rainfall in a decade
subtopics.content: • Meghalaya received record rainfall in July 2025, impacting agriculture and infrastructure.

subtopics.subtopic: Mizoram promotes bamboo industry in July
subtopics.content: • Mizoram government launched incentives for bamboo processing units in July 2025.

subtopics.subtopic: Nagaland launches youth entrepreneurship scheme in July
subtopics.content: • Nagaland government started a new scheme for youth entrepreneurs in July 2025.

subtopics.subtopic: Odisha expands millet mission in July
subtopics.content: • Odisha government expanded its millet cultivation program in July 2025 to improve nutrition and farmer income.

subtopics.subtopic: Punjab announces loan waiver for small farmers in July
subtopics.content: • Punjab government announced a loan waiver for small and marginal farmers in July 2025.

subtopics.subtopic: Rajasthan hosts desert festival in July
subtopics.content: • Rajasthan organized a desert festival in Jaisalmer in July 2025 to promote tourism and culture.

subtopics.subtopic: Sikkim launches new organic farming initiative in July
subtopics.content: • Sikkim government started a new organic farming program in July 2025 to boost exports.

topic: 52. Tamil Nadu Textile Park Inauguration – July 2025

subtopics.subtopic: Tamil Nadu inaugurates textile park in July
subtopics.content: • Tamil Nadu inaugurated a new textile park in Coimbatore in July 2025, creating jobs for local youth.

subtopics.subtopic: Telangana expands IT hub in July
subtopics.content: • Telangana government expanded its IT hub in Hyderabad in July 2025, attracting new investments.

subtopics.subtopic: Tripura reports growth in rubber production in July
subtopics.content: • Tripura reported a 20% increase in rubber production in July 2025, boosting state revenue.

subtopics.subtopic: UP completes new expressway section in July
subtopics.content: • Uttar Pradesh completed a major section of the Purvanchal Expressway in July 2025, improving connectivity.

subtopics.subtopic: Uttarakhand upgrades disaster response in July
subtopics.content: • Uttarakhand government upgraded its disaster response system in July 2025, adding new rescue equipment.

topic: 57. West Bengal School Infrastructure Scheme – July 2025

subtopics.subtopic: West Bengal launches school infrastructure scheme in July
subtopics.content: • West Bengal government started a new scheme to upgrade school buildings in July 2025.

subtopics.subtopic: Chandigarh wins smart city award in July
subtopics.content: • Chandigarh received a national smart city award in July 2025 for urban innovation.

subtopics.subtopic: Delhi Metro expands network in July
subtopics.content: • Delhi Metro added two new lines in July 2025, improving public transport connectivity.

subtopics.subtopic: Puducherry launches beach restoration in July
subtopics.content: • Puducherry government started a beach restoration project in July 2025 to combat erosion.

subtopics.subtopic: Ladakh launches solar energy initiative in July
subtopics.content: • Ladakh government launched a solar energy program in July 2025 to power remote villages.

subtopics.subtopic: Lakshadweep starts coral conservation drive in July
subtopics.content: • Lakshadweep initiated a coral conservation campaign in July 2025 to protect marine biodiversity.

subtopics.subtopic: Daman & Diu promote tourism in July
subtopics.content: • Daman & Diu launched a new tourism campaign in July 2025 to attract visitors.

topic: 64. Dadra & Nagar Haveli Skill Training Scheme – July 2025

subtopics.subtopic: Skill training scheme launched in Dadra & Nagar Haveli in July
subtopics.content: • Dadra & Nagar Haveli government started a skill training program for youth in July 2025.

topic: 65. Jammu & Kashmir Handicraft Export Growth – July 2025

subtopics.subtopic: J&K reports growth in handicraft exports in July
subtopics.content: • Jammu & Kashmir reported a 12% increase in handicraft exports in July 2025, boosting local artisans.

topic: 66. Andaman & Nicobar Islands Eco-Tourism Launch – July 2025

subtopics.subtopic: Eco-tourism initiative launched in Andaman & Nicobar in July
subtopics.content: • Andaman & Nicobar Islands launched an eco-tourism program in July 2025 to promote sustainable travel.

subtopics.subtopic: Maharashtra updates EV policy in July
subtopics.content: • Maharashtra government revised its electric vehicle policy in July 2025 to encourage adoption.

subtopics.subtopic: Gujarat reports textile export growth in July
subtopics.content: • Gujarat reported a 10% increase in textile exports in July 2025, driven by new trade agreements.

subtopics.subtopic: Kerala Startup Mission wins national award in July
subtopics.content: • Kerala Startup Mission received a national innovation award in July 2025 for supporting new businesses.

topic: 70. Rajasthan Solar Power Plant Inauguration – July 2025

subtopics.subtopic: Rajasthan inaugurates new solar power plant in July
subtopics.content: • Rajasthan inaugurated a 200 MW solar power plant in July 2025, boosting renewable energy capacity.

topic: 71. Uttar Pradesh Dairy Sector Growth – July 2025

subtopics.subtopic: UP reports dairy sector growth in July
subtopics.content: • Uttar Pradesh reported a 15% increase in dairy production in July 2025, supporting rural livelihoods.

topic: 72. Tamil Nadu Renewable Energy Policy – July 2025

subtopics.subtopic: Tamil Nadu updates renewable energy policy in July
subtopics.content: • Tamil Nadu government revised its renewable energy policy in July 2025 to attract investments.

subtopics.subtopic: Punjab upgrades sports infrastructure in July
subtopics.content: • Punjab government upgraded sports facilities in major cities in July 2025.

subtopics.subtopic: West Bengal hosts handloom expo in July
subtopics.content: • West Bengal organized a handloom expo in Kolkata in July 2025 to promote local artisans.

subtopics.subtopic: Karnataka achieves IT export milestone in July
subtopics.content: • Karnataka reported $20 billion in IT exports in July 2025, maintaining its leadership in the sector.

subtopics.subtopic: Telangana completes irrigation project in July
subtopics.content: • Telangana completed a major irrigation project in July 2025, improving water supply for farmers.

topic: 77. Madhya Pradesh Tribal Art Festival – July 2025

subtopics.subtopic: MP hosts tribal art festival in July
subtopics.content: • Madhya Pradesh organized a tribal art festival in Bhopal in July 2025 to showcase indigenous culture.

subtopics.subtopic: Bihar launches road connectivity project in July
subtopics.content: • Bihar government started a new road connectivity project in July 2025 to link rural areas.
